Name: Neko Ghost, Jump!
About the game: Using the ability to switch between 2D & 3D camera perspectives will be critical to navigating these treacherous lands. The ghostform with its spiritually-enhanced swordfish allows you to take out any enemies in your way, locate hidden loot in the ghost realms, and jump on other-wise inaccessible platforms. 100s of character customization options 40 levels divided between 8 biomes Leaderboards in each level to compete against others if you desire Challenging boss fights in each biome Accessibility and Assist options available Razer Chroma RGB-enabled Nekoworld is a peaceful, fun-loving world inhabited by the Neko people. One day, on Nekoman's wedding day, Space Dog Pirates invade and abduct all of Nekoman's friends and family. It's up to you to help him rescue his bride-to-be and everyone else as well.
